snippet: The judge in the trial of the anticorruption blogger Aleksei A. Navalny granted his request for a postponement to allow more time to prepare.
abstract: Russian court postpones trial of Aleksei A Navalny, opposition leader and anticorruption blogger who is accused of embezzlement and corruption, prolonging for one week the anticipation of most politically charged court case in recent Russian history; lawyer for Navalny says postponement allows time for regional court to issue ruling on his complaint that authorities mishandled his case.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the trial of the anticorruption blogger Aleksei A. Navalny granted his request for a postponement to allow more time to prepare.

headline.seo: Trial of Putin Nemesis Is Delayed for a Week
headline.main: Trial of Putin Nemesis Is Delayed a Week for the Defense
headline.print_headline: Trial of Putin Nemesis Is Delayed a Week for the Defense
